Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 7
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty VII; sheet 4; Hieratic text verso and recto. Recto 6-8, Verso 1-3, beginning Verso 4. Recto: Spells for Protection Against Scorpions Verso: Continuation of Spells Against Scorpions; Others Against Fever, etc.
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner, Hieratic Papyri, Vol. 1 pp. 55-65, Vol. 2, Plate 36, Recto 6-8; Plate 36-37, Verso 1-3, beginning Verso 4. Roccati, RdE 24, p. 155-158 [verso 1-2]. Posener, RdE 33, p. 139 [verso 7,6]. Bardinet, RdE 39, p. 12-13 [verso 1, 4].
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381086) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381086)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: loss, fractured, fragile Black ink Red ink Tabbed: kraft paper Tabbed: silk Displayed in Room 62 until 1997 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
